Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires notice be provided to any officer or employee of the department of correctional services whose personal information is the subject of a subpoena duces tecum
Summary: Requires that notice be provided to any officer or employee of the department of corrections and community supervision whose personal information is the subject of a subpoena duces tecum.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the subpoena power of the commissioner of the department of correctional services
